/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a bright sun that filters through the trees lining the road. The buildings, tall and modern, rise on either side of the street, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted against the stark white of the road. The perspective of the image is from a high vantage point, looking down on the scene, giving a sense of scale and depth to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of clouds, adding to the overall brightness of the scene.
